title: A nocturne is usually played on what musical instrument? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would think a better question might be what is a Nocturne. comparing it to a sonata concerto, Impromptu or free form the purpose matters. It seems to be played on a piano but some are written for ensemble. I don’t think a Nocturne for classical guitar is excluded - Can you arrange a piano nocturne on guitar or another instrument? This would require you to change the range of the work which would be good for study. I don’t mean this in the study of performance but rather in a creative way to study the literature or to learn to write one your self. To study these composers and the level they think on can be educational.
